title: Get the invoices of a BC

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: invoice_types
parameters.description: Invoice types. Enum values: RECON : Reconciliation Invoice. CREDIT : Credit Invoice. AUTO_PAY : Automatic Payment Invoice. Note : AUTO_PAY cannot be used with other invoice types. To filter Automatic Payment Invoices, set invoice_types to ["AUTO_PAY"] .

parameters.name: pay_statuses
parameters.description: Payment statuses of the invoices. Enum values: UNPAID , PAID , PARTIAL_PAID , NO_NEED (No need to pay).

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: The start time for the invoice issuance, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS . Example: 2024-01-01 00:00:00 . You must specify both start_time and end_time or neither.

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description: The end time for the invoice issuance, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS . Example: 2024-02-01 00:00:00 . You must specify both start_time and end_time or neither.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Page size, in the range of 1-50. Default value: 10.

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

fields.name: list
fields.description: List of invoices.

fields.name: invoice_id
fields.description: Invoice ID.

fields.name: serial_number
fields.description: Invoice serial number.

fields.name: subject_id
fields.description: Contract subject ID.

fields.name: send_date
fields.description: Invoice issue date, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD.

fields.name: currency_code
fields.description: Currency.

fields.name: status
fields.description: Invoice approval status. Enum values: CREATED , SUBMITTED , APPROVED , DELETED .

fields.name: due_date
fields.description: Invoice due date.

fields.name: invoice_type
fields.description: Invoice type. Enum values: RECON : Reconciliation Invoice. CREDIT : Credit Invoice. AUTO_PAY : Automatic Payment Invoice.

fields.name: entity_serials
fields.description: Entity serial numbers associated with the invoice.

fields.name: negative_invoice_ids
fields.description: ID and serial number of the associated negative invoices that has been approved, returned when the current invoice is a positive invoice and has been reversed.

fields.name: invoice_id
fields.description: Invoice ID of the associated negative invoices.

fields.name: serial_number
fields.description: Invoice serial number of the associated negative invoices.

fields.name: positive_invoice_ids
fields.description: ID and serial number of the associated positive invoices, returned when the current invoice is a negative invoice.

fields.name: invoice_id
fields.description: Invoice ID of the associated positive invoices.

fields.name: serial_number
fields.description: Invoice serial number of the associated positive invoices.

fields.name: billing_group_id
fields.description: Billing Group ID of the invoice.

fields.name: account_name
fields.description: Account name.

fields.name: invoice_title
fields.description: Invoice title.

fields.name: country_code
fields.description: Location code.

fields.name: address
fields.description: Account billing address.

fields.name: emails
fields.description: A list of email addressess from invoice for billing.

fields.name: tax_id1
fields.description: ID number of the first tax type of the invoice.

fields.name: tax_id2
fields.description: ID number of the second tax type of the invoice.

fields.name: amount
fields.description: Total amount, including tax.

fields.name: amount_excluding_tax
fields.description: Total amount, excluding tax

fields.name: total_tax_amount
fields.description: Total tax amount, in the same currency of the invoice.

fields.name: tax_type1
fields.description: The first tax type of the invoice.

fields.name: tax_rate1
fields.description: Rate of the first tax type.

fields.name: tax_amount1
fields.description: Amount of the first tax type.

fields.name: tax_type2
fields.description: The second tax type of the invoice.

fields.name: tax_rate2
fields.description: Rate of the second tax type.

fields.name: tax_amount2
fields.description: Amount of the second tax type.

fields.name: pay_status
fields.description: Payment statuses of the invoices.

fields.name: overdue_status
fields.description: Overdue status. Enum values: INITIALIZED , YES , NO .

fields.name: unpaid_amount
fields.description: Unpaid amount.

fields.name: page_info
fields.description: Pagination information.

fields.name: page
fields.description: Current page number.

fields.name: page_size
fields.description: Page size.

fields.name: total_number
fields.description: Total number of results.

fields.name: total_page
fields.description: Total pages of results.

fields.name: request_id
fields.description: The log id of the request, which uniquely identifies a request.
